attributes.action: STOP SUPPLYING UKRAINE WITH UK WEAPONS AND PROMOTE PEACE TALKS
attributes.additional_details: Give the entire country a choice on the supplying of weapons to Ukraine. Let it be a vote of the entire uk as right now we have no choice over our own futures. We don’t want a nuclear war.
attributes.background: We want a vote to promote peace talks regarding the Russia invasion of Ukraine. We do not want British weapons sent to Ukraine. We need to stop getting involved

rejection.details:
It's not clear if you want the Government to just change its policy in relation to the war in Ukraine, or to hold a public referendum on its policy, but we have already published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Referendum on ending government's economically costly Ukraine/Russia policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629895

Stop supplying military equipment to Ukraine and promote peace talks with Russia: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632957
